segments.text: why are there still so many people overweight despite the current fitness craze ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , there are certain factors that effect people's size and weight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: one study said that low-income groups have a higher percentage of over-weight people than higher income families .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the survey said that the low , income groups eat more junk food on a daily basis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that makes sense . Probably less time to make dinner and the junk food is cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: and junk food contains lots of fat and oil . There is one final reason why so many people are fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: nobody exercises anymore-not even kids ! The average american home has the TV on for 6 hours a day !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: wow ! No wonder people are so fat . Say , Carl , looks like you could be doing a bit more exercising .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you should consider eating healthier food and getting some more exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: hey , I started a diet and lost 10 pounds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I quit and gained it back plus 5 pounds .
segments.speaker: S2
